question: The Theme for World Sleep Day 2018 is __________.
option1: Join the Sleep World, Preserve Your Rhythms to Enjoy Life
option3: Good Sleep is a Reachable Dream
answer: Join the Sleep World, Preserve Your Rhythms to Enjoy Life
explanation: World Sleep Day was observed all over the world on Mar 16. World Sleep Day is an annual event organized by the World Sleep Day Committee of World Sleep Society. It is observed every year on the Friday before Spring Vernal Equinox. The next World Sleep Day will be on 15 March 2019. This day aims to reduce the burden of sleep problems by means of better prevention and management of sleep disorders. Theme for World Sleep Day 2018: Join the Sleep World, Preserve Your Rhythms to Enjoy Life.
